text.title: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are

head.s: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are

p.s: Sometimes we 're wondering of what we 're going to do in the future .
We keep on wondering , until there 's a time where you feel lonely and your life is n't that fun .
Well , get up ! Keep on reading this to fit in the crowd without having to change your style or personality .
Only changing the way you treat people would make it .

item.s: Do n't be stubborn when people are telling good compliments about you .
This makes people think you 're overreacting .
Especially for girls .
What 's the hard thing of saying " Thank You " on every compliment that people are giving ?

figure.rend: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are Step 1.jpg

item.s: " If there 's just one kind of folks , why ca n't they get along with each other ?
If they 're all alike , why do they go out of their way to despise each other ?
Just look at that quote for a minute .
What comes to your mind is about your worst enemy or your hypocrite friend or whatever kind of person that is treating you really bad if I am not wrong .
The thing here is , do n't start a fight with anyone if you do n't know how to end it .
Do n't say sorry if you do n't mean it .
It 's just going to make people think you 're a person , who treats people as you want to .

figure.rend: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are Step 2.jpg

item.s: If you have any hidden talents , try to find it out whether it matches to you or whether it 's not .
If you have found out , show the world your talent(s) and let it be a personal achievement for you if you did something with it .
With letting people know your talent(s) , you 'll get a chance to be called " a unique person " by the crowd .

figure.rend: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are Step 3.jpg

item.s: Be honest at every situation .
It 's the important thing to be honest to everyone you know .
Especially when an honesty action is needed , do n't hesitate to be honest .

figure.rend: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are Step 4.jpg

item.s: Be fun !
Do n't be mad at every little jokes your friend made on you .
It 's just a joke and nothing is more .
If you 're being mad , than. . it means the joke is a fact of which involves you .
Unless if someone did a really annoying thing and really mean thing , you can do something .
Or , if you found those kinds of people , leave them alone and they 're gonna be shy themselves because of their joke are n't accepted by any deal .

figure.rend: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are Step 5.jpg

item.s: Be nice to everyone ! People wo n't accept you if you 're perfect but mean !
when someone needs a help , give them one and do n't hesitate of giving your energy .

figure.rend: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are Step 6.jpg

item.s: Be who you are .
You will fit in the crowd if you 're following the tips above .
But it does n't mean you 're gonna fit in the crowd happily .
The only thing to be happy is being who you are .

figure.rend: Fit in the Crowd With Being Who You Are Step 7.jpg

item.s: do n't change the way you walk , eat , talk or anything .
Just be who you are and everything will be just perfect .
NEVER overreact !
Because that will only make people get annoyed .
